author: jmo
title: NFT Fighters: Cross-Chain Gaming
description: A platform is needed for NFT communities from multiple blockchain to learn about and interact with each other.

author: johntmeuser1
title: Native Tokens Integration
description: Adding a native token to the cardano network to be live and get it up and running for any stage of funding or launching or ICO is too long.

author: sustainableada
title: Youth+Women Cardano NFT4Good Party
description: Lack of a cross-chain Cardano education program, equipping + empowering youth + women with 21st century skill sets + unlocking creativity.

author: raz
title: Cardano impact project directory
description: Lack of awareness of Cardano4Good projects and lack of ease to locate them, in an open access database, with other blockchain4good projects.

author: cautiousfox
title: KILT & Cardano
description: There is a mutual interest to connect Cardano and the Polkadot/Kusama communities. But pioneers are needed to initiate the collaboration.

author: matthiasksieber
title: Adatar.me for BTC
description: BTC’s hashed public key based wallet addresses are not human-readable and do not offer personalization.

title: Adatar.me for ATOM
description: ATOM’s hashed public key based wallet addresses are not human-readable and do not offer personalization.

author: matthiasksieber
title: Adatar.me for EGLD
description: EGLD Addresses are ugly

author: nick.odio
title: Ferrum: InfinitySwap-Milestone 1-2
description: Secure interoperability protocols connecting L1 solutions to both non EVM and EVM compatible networks are non-existent in todays landscape.

author: nick.odio
title: Ferrum: InfinitySwap-Milestone 3-4
description: Secure interoperability protocols connecting L1 solutions to both non EVM and EVM compatible networks are non-existent in todays landscape.

author: nick.odio
title: Ferrum: InfinitySwap-Milestone 5
description: Secure interoperability protocols connecting L1 solutions to both non EVM and EVM compatible networks are non-existent in todays landscape.

author: cautiousfox
title: Cross-Chain Ambassadors (v 1.0)
description: People are busy. Networking with other chains, understanding their needs and educating their communities about Catalyst/Cardano takes time.

author: kiriakos
title: Finish the Filecoin Bridge!
description: Let's finish the fund 5 I funded project to build a bridge to Filecoin in order to facilitate guaranteed storage of CNFTs for eternity

author: dfolino
title: Growing the US Blockchain Community
description: Trying to launch chains and pass regulations in silos leads to inconsistent development while leaving blockchain communities untapped.

author: heinz.gassner
title: DLT360: Metaverse and Governance
description: Without basic definitions and open cross-chain governance, WEB 3.0 and Metaverse will just be empty marketing buzzwords

author: danilorosaagr
title: Coopercrypto
description: A falta de cooperação entre as comunidades blockchain atrasa o crescimento da comunidade crypto em geral

author: heinz.gassner
title: DLT360: Metaverse Interoperability
description: Without basic definitions and cross-chain interoperability, WEB 3.0 and Metaverse will just be empty marketing buzzwords

author: tihomir.dimov
title: Divine Blockchain - Phase I
description: Bad temperature monitoring, the storage conditions through the entire supply chain are the most common cause of loss of a wine's quality.

author: wolfram.blockchain.labs
title: Wolfram Cross-Chain Framework
description: The future of crypto is multi-chain and Cardano needs to accelerate the experimentation of cross-chain services.

author: defidiscussions
title: Cross-Chain Networking Events EXT
description: As Crypto currency becomes more prominent it is important to steer the development of the larger community away from tribalism.

author: albert.feghaly
title: PanDAO: Focus on dDataStorage
description: There exists a pressing need for cross-chain interaction standards when it comes to NFT data that live on decentralized storage systems.

author: gonzalocamps
title: ADA-DESO Templates to Test Projects
description: Cardano Catalyst projects that aim to use Tokenomics, DAO or NFTs face barriers to build and test/validate massively with potential users.

author: callmenighthawke
title: Crypto Talent Marketplace
description: Cardano, Ethereum, and Solana are suffering from a talent crisis and lack of cross chain collaboration.

author: nicoarqueros
title: ERC721 & ERC-1155 for Milkomeda
description: Milkomeda allows moving native tokens <-> ERC20 tokens between Cardano and Milkomeda, but does not support ERC721 or ERC1155 (ex: NFTs)

author: rg.admin
title: Research Guild: Cross-Chain Report
description: Cardano values academic rigor; however, the Catalyst community lacks coordinated research that strategizes cross-chain collaboration.

author: wadalliance
title: Cross-Chain Connector|Search Engine
description: Determining official project assets and how to integrate is a challenge. Finding the correct verified APIs, processes, and contacts is hard.

author: oliverross
title: OnChainUniversity - Free Education
description: Pathways for learning about blockchain and cryptocurrency are very chain-specific, and often do not promote cross-chain collaboration.

author: ergopool
title: Build out ERGO Pool Infrastructure
description: We would like to create a stake pool that allows you to stake your Ada and earn the Ergo token.

author: raz
title: Cross-Chain Impact Lead Generator
description: The impact of blockchain tech is integral to Cardano & Charles' vision, but collaboration with other chains is relatively limited.

author: shlomocohen
title: United Caricature
description: There is not enough creative ways that connect between chains and unite them to grow mass adoption

author: gentner.eva
title: Cross-Chain NFT Conference OxBAT
description: Many independent NFT spaces are evolving without exchange across different chains which leads to a negative perception of NFTs in public.

author: checkpoint
title: Cross Chain Multiverse Travel
description: There is no real motivation for people to use multiple blockchains and no clear way that assets are cross chain compatible.

author: daynavision
title: Cardano+Ethereum Lifesaving NFT's
description: It’s hard for creatives to build multi-chain awareness and community through NFTs due to lack of cross chain teams, strategy, and resources

author: revelar
title: The NFT Gaming Podcast - Season 2
description: Gaming communities are siloed by blockchain, causing gamers to miss out on engaging games on other blockchains due to a lack of awareness.
